mysteryDungeon:AgilityPower.NAME: Agility
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you enter or exit a #yStance, draw #b%s card.
Whenever you enter or exit a #yStance, draw #b%s cards.

mysteryDungeon:AromatherapyPower.NAME: Aromatherapy
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take damage, gain #b%s #yStrength.
Whenever you take damage, gain #b%s Strength.

mysteryDungeon:AsleepPower.NAME: Asleep
DESCRIPTIONS: This monster won't act this turn, unless it receives damage. If it does, it wakes up. When it wakes up, it will go back to the intent it had before falling asleep.
This monster won't act for the next #b%s turns, unless it receives damage. If it does, it wakes up. When it will wake up, it will go back to the intent it had before falling asleep.

mysteryDungeon:AquaRingPower.NAME: Aqua Ring
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn, for each card you #yscry or #ydiscard, gain #b%s #yBlock. NL If the card was a #yStatus card, deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:AvalanchePower.NAME: Avalanche
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you activate an Orb, deal damage equal to your Block to a random enemy.
Whenever you activate an Orb, deal damage equal to your Block to a random enemy %s times.

mysteryDungeon:BellyDrumPower.NAME: Belly Drum
DESCRIPTIONS: The first card you play each turn cost #b0, but #yexhausts.
The first %s cards you play each turn cost 0, but exhaust.

mysteryDungeon:BidePower.NAME: Bide
DESCRIPTIONS: When you get attacked, Gain #b%s Temporary Strength.

mysteryDungeon:BlazePower.NAME: Blaze
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you have no Energy left each turn, gain [E].
The first #b%s times you have no Energy left each turn, gain [E].

mysteryDungeon:BurnPower.NAME: Burn
DESCRIPTIONS: For every 5 stacks of Burn, this creature deals 1 less damage. NL Currently deals #b%s less damage. NL The amount is reduced by a third every turn.

mysteryDungeon:ChikoritaExplorerPower.NAME: Explorer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: When you heal #yHP, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to the amount healed.
When you heal #yHP, deal damage to ALL enemies equal to #b%s times the amount healed.

mysteryDungeon:CharmanderExplorerPower.NAME: Explorer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn Exhume #b%s random card.

mysteryDungeon:ChikoritaWorrySeedPower.NAME: Worry Seed
DESCRIPTIONS: During your turn, Lose #b1 HP per card played. At the end of your turn, Heal #b2 HP.
During your turn, Lose #b%s HP per card played. At the end of your turn, Heal 2 HP #b%s times.

mysteryDungeon:CounterPower.NAME: Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: When you lose all #yBlock and receive attack damage, deal #b%s damage to the attacker.
When you lose all #yBlock and receive attack damage, deal #b%s damage to the attacker.

mysteryDungeon:CursePower.NAME: Curse
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you draw a Status or Curse each turn, gain [E].
The first #b%s times draw a Status or a Curse each turn, gain [E].

mysteryDungeon:CyndaquilCounterPower.NAME: Counter
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn spend all leftover energy and gain #b%s #yBlock for each energy spent.

mysteryDungeon:CyndaquilExplorerPower.NAME: Explorer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you cause an #yEruption, deal #b%s to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:CrushClawPower.NAME: Crush Claw
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yEruption will deal 50% more damage.
Your next #b%s #yEruption will deal 50%% more damage.

mysteryDungeon:DroughtPower.NAME: Drought
DESCRIPTIONS: When you apply #yBurn apply #b%s more.
When you apply #yBurn apply #b%s more.

mysteryDungeon:EncorePower.NAME: Encore
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn your next #yAttack or #ySkill is played twice

mysteryDungeon:EndurePower.NAME: Endure
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play a status card deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:EvasivenessDropPower.NAME: Evasiveness Drop
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemy loses #b50% of their Block at the end of their turn.
Enemy loses #b50%% of their Block at the end of their turn for #b%s turns.

mysteryDungeon:FirePledgePower.NAME: Fire Pledge
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play another Pledge card this turn, activate one of the following effects. NL Grass: Apply 9 Poison to all enemies. NL Water: Apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:FlashFirePower.NAME: Flash Fire
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, apply #b%s #yBurn to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:FreeSpendingEveryTurnPowe.NAME: Investment
DESCRIPTIONS: Each turn, the first time you should spend gold, do not spend any.
Each turn, the first #b%s times you should spend gold, do not spend any.

mysteryDungeon:FreeSpendingThisTurnPower.NAME: Bargain
DESCRIPTIONS: Next time you should spend gold this turn, do not spend any.
Next #b%s times you should spend gold this turn, do not spend any.

mysteryDungeon:FrustrationPower.NAME: Frustration
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn choose up to #b1 card to #yretain. NL This card becomes #yEthereal.
At the end of your turn choose up to #b%s card to #yretain. NL Those cards become #yEthereal.

mysteryDungeon:FuryCutterPower.NAME: Fury Cutter
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%s #yFury #yCutter from cards exhausted this combat to your hand.
At the start of your turn, add #b%s upgraded #yFury #yCutter from cards exhausted this combat to your hand.
At the start of your turn, add #b%s #yFury #yCutter and #b%s #yFury #yCutter #y+ from cards exhausted this combat to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:GrassPledgePower.NAME: Grass Pledge
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play another #yPledge #yCard this turn, activate one of the following effects. NL Fire: Apply #b9 #yPoison to ALL enemies. NL Water: Apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:HailPower.NAME: Hail
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you draw a card, deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:HealPulsePower.NAME: Heal Pulse
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal yourself damage or gain HP during your turn, gain #b%s #yBlock.

mysteryDungeon:HeatCrashPower.NAME: Heat Crash
DESCRIPTIONS: When this enemy dies, ALL enemies receive damage equal to #b%d times its #yBurn Stacks. NL Currently it would deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.
When this enemy dies, ALL enemies receive damage equal to #b%d times its #yBurn Stacks. NL Currently it would deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:HeatWavePower.NAME: Heat Wave
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you are attacked this turn, apply #b%s #yBurn to your attacker.

mysteryDungeon:InfernoPower.NAME: Inferno
DESCRIPTIONS: Your next #yEruption will not remove any #yBurn stacks.
Your next #b%s #yEruption will not remove any #yBurn stacks.

mysteryDungeon:LashOutPower.NAME: Lash Out
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yStrength or #yBlock, create #b%s #yFlurry in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:LavaPlumePower.NAME: Lava Plume
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you trigger an #yEruption, apply #b%s #yBurn to the target.

mysteryDungeon:LeafGuardPower.NAME: Leaf Guard
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, remove ALL debuff you have. for each debuff removed this way lose #b%s HP.

mysteryDungeon:LeechSeedPower.NAME: Leech Seed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the turn, this monster loses #b%s HP, and you gain #b%s HP. At the end of the turn, if the leech seed's owner has not taken any damage from any other source, the amount is reduced by half.

mysteryDungeon:LightScreenPower.NAME: Light Screen
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, gain #b%s Block per empty orb slot.

mysteryDungeon:LockDownPower.NAME: Lock-Down
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, do not return automatically to the center of the charge gauge.

mysteryDungeon:LoseVigorPower.NAME: Lose Vigor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, lose #b%s #yVigor.
At the end of the turn, lose #b%s #yVigor.

mysteryDungeon:MagicCoatPower.NAME: Magic Coat
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal yourself damage this turn, deal as much damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:NaturePowerMountainPower.NAME: Nature Power: Mountain
DESCRIPTIONS: This turn Burn stacks will not decrease.
For the next #b%s turns Burn stacks will not decrease.

mysteryDungeon:NextTurnDrawLessPower.NAME: Next Turn: Draw Less Cards
DESCRIPTIONS: Next Turn, draw #b1 less card.
Next Turn, draw #b%s less cards.

mysteryDungeon:NextTurnEruptionPower.NAME: Next Turn: Eruption
DESCRIPTIONS: Next Turn, Cause an Eruption.
Next Turn, Cause #b%s Eruptions.

mysteryDungeon:NextTurnLoseHpPower.NAME: Next Turn: Lose Hp
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, Lose #b%s Hp.

mysteryDungeon:NextTurnNoBlockPower.NAME: Next Turn: No Block
DESCRIPTIONS: Next turn, you cannot gain Block
During the next #b%s turns, you cannot gain Block.

mysteryDungeon:NextTurnVigorPower.NAME: Next Turn: Vigor
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of the next turn, gain #b1 #yVigor.
At the start of the next turn, gain #b%s #yVigor.
At the start of the next #b%s turns, gain #b1 #yVigor.
At the start of the next #b%1$s turns, gain #b%2$s #yVigor.

mysteryDungeon:NoHealPower.NAME: No Heal
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot heal this turn.
You cannot heal for #b%s turns.

mysteryDungeon:OutragePower.NAME: Outrage
DESCRIPTIONS: When you exhaust a card, apply #b%s #yBurn to a random enemy.

mysteryDungeon:OvergrowPower.NAME: Overgrow
DESCRIPTIONS: Each time you your Recover counter reaches #b0, gain #b%s Strength.

mysteryDungeon:PetalDancePower.NAME: Petal Dance
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, deal #b%1$s damage to ALL enemies. NL (This counts as an #yAttack).
For #b%1$s turns, at the end of the turn, deal #b%2$s damage to ALL enemies. NL (This counts as an #yAttack).

mysteryDungeon:PoisonThornsPower.NAME: Poison Thorns
DESCRIPTIONS: When Attacked, apply #b%s #yPoison to the attacker.

mysteryDungeon:PikachuExplorerPower.NAME: Explorer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, evoke your next Orb, then channel #b%s Lightning.

mysteryDungeon:PsychUpPower.NAME: Psych Up
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yStrength gain #b%s #yStrength.

mysteryDungeon:RainDancePower.NAME: Rain Dance
DESCRIPTIONS: When a card is created, gain #b%s #yTemporary #yStrength.

mysteryDungeon:RainDishPower.NAME: Rain Dish
DESCRIPTIONS: When you manually discard or scry a card, gain #b%s #yBlock.

mysteryDungeon:RecoverPower.NAME: Recovery
DESCRIPTIONS: When you receives damage, increase the number of stacks by as much damage you received. NL When you deal attack damage, heal 30%% of the attack damage dealt up to #b%s.

mysteryDungeon:ReduceHighestCostAtStartO.NAME: Lower Cost of Highest Cost Card
DESCRIPTIONS: The cost of your highest cost card is lowered by one after draw.
The cost of your #b%s highest cost cards is lowered by one after draw.

mysteryDungeon:RestPower.NAME: Rest
DESCRIPTIONS: You cannot play cards targeting the enemy during this turn.
You cannot play cards targeting the enemy during this turn and the next.
You cannot play cards targeting the enemy during this turn and the next #b%s turns.

mysteryDungeon:SleepTalkPower.NAME: Sleep Talk
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you exhaust a card each turn, add a random card to your hand.
The first #b%s times you exhaust a card each turn, add a random card to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:CyndaquilSleepTalkPower.NAME: Sleep Talk
DESCRIPTIONS: When you create a Status Card, draw a card.
When you create a Status Card, draw #b%s cards.

mysteryDungeon:SolarPowerPower.NAME: Solar Power
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if an enemy has #yBurn, gain #b%s #yStrength.

mysteryDungeon:SquirtleExplorerPower.NAME: Explorer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your next turn draw #b%s more card. Increase this amount by #b%s at the end of your turn.
At the start of your next turn draw #b%s more cards. Increase this amount by #b%s at the end of your turn.

mysteryDungeon:StaticPower.NAME: Static
DESCRIPTIONS: Evoke %s orb when you are attacked.
Evoke %s orbs when you are attacked.

mysteryDungeon:SunnyDayPower.NAME: Sunny Day
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal yourself damage, for each 3 HP lost total, draw %s card.
Whenever you deal yourself damage, for each 3 HP lost total, draw %s cards.

mysteryDungeon:SurfPower.NAME: Surf
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you discard a card, gain 1 mysterydungeon:Temporary_Vigor.
Whenever you discard a card, gain %s mysterydungeon:Temporary_Vigor.

mysteryDungeon:SweetKissPower.NAME: Sweet Kiss
DESCRIPTIONS: Apply #b%s #yWeak to ALL enemies every time you enter or exit a stance.

mysteryDungeon:TechnicianPower.NAME: Technician
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, create #b%s #yFlurry in your hand.

mysteryDungeon:ThunderPower.NAME: Thunder
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you evoke an Orb, deal #b%s damage to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:ThrashPower.NAME: Thrash
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 4 Attacks you play, gain %1$s #yVigor. NL (%2$s card till #yVigor gain)
Every 4 Attacks you play, gain %1$s #yVigor. NL (%2$s cards till #yVigor gain)

mysteryDungeon:ThrashPlusPower.NAME: Thrash+
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 3 Attacks you play, gain %1$s #yVigor. NL (%2$s card till #yVigor gain)
Every 3 Attacks you play, gain %1$s #yVigor. NL (%2$s cards till #yVigor gain)

mysteryDungeon:TorrentPower.NAME: Torrent
DESCRIPTIONS: When you shuffle your deck, gain #b%s #yTemporary #yStrength.

mysteryDungeon:TotodileExplorerPower.NAME: Explorer Form
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, add #b%s card from your discard pile to your hand.

mysteryDungeon:SheerForcePower.NAME: Sheer Force
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you deal #b%1$s or more unblocked damage, channel #b1 #yFrost.
Whenever you deal #b%1$s or more unblocked damage, channel #b%2$s #yFrost.

mysteryDungeon:ToxicPower.NAME: Toxic
DESCRIPTIONS: Instead of decreasing by one every turn, the Poison on this enemy will increase by #b%s every turn.

mysteryDungeon:UnnervePower.NAME: Unnerve
DESCRIPTIONS: For every 25 gold spent, gain #b%s #yPlated #yArmor.

mysteryDungeon:WaterfallPower.NAME: Waterfall
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of the turn, shuffle you discard pile into your draw pile. At the start of your turn, scry #b%s cards.

mysteryDungeon:WaterPledgePower.NAME: Water Pledge
DESCRIPTIONS: When you play another #yPledge card this turn, activate one of the following effects. NL Grass: Apply #b2 #yWeak to ALL enemies. NL Fire: Apply #b2 #yVulnerable to ALL enemies.

mysteryDungeon:WhirlpoolPower.NAME: Whirlpool
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, draw #b2 cards and discard #b2 cards.
For #b%s turns, at the start of your turn, draw #b2 cards and discard #b2 cards.

mysteryDungeon:WorrySeedPower.NAME: Worry Seed
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of this combat, your card rewards will have one more card choice.
At the end of this combat, your card rewards will have #b%s more card choices.

mysteryDungeon:YawnPower.NAME: Yawn
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemy will fall #yAsleep for one turn right before they act.
Enemy will fall #yAsleep for #b%s turns right before they act.
